translations: v．解散，遣散：指组织、团队或集体解散，成员分散。
· The club disbanded after the members graduated.
成员们毕业后，俱乐部解散了。

sentences.sentence: All the armed groups will be disbanded.
sentences.translation: 所有武装团体将被解散。

sentences.sentence: The committee formally disbanded in August.
sentences.translation: 委员会于八月份正式解散。

sentences.sentence: The club disbanded at the end of the year.
